channel.title: GDACS RSS information
channel.description: Near real-time alerts about natural disaster with a potential humanitarian impact

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.9M, Depth:10km) in Vanuatu 16/05/2016 00:41 UTC, No people within 100km.
item.description: On 5/16/2016 12:41:53 AM, an earthquake occurred in Vanuatu potentially affecting No people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.9M, Depth:10km.
item.dc:subject: EQ1

gdacs:resource.gdacs:title: WMS service of GDACS Active Alerts
gdacs:resource.gdacs:description: This WMS service shows GDACS alerts of the past 7 days.

gdacs:resource.gdacs:title: WMS service of GDACS Earthquake Alerts
gdacs:resource.gdacs:description: This WMS service shows the earthquakes in the past 7 days

gdacs:resource.gdacs:title: Country disaster profile (DesInventar)
gdacs:resource.gdacs:description: This Country Profile shows a set of typical results known as "Preliminary Analysis" comming from the disaster database. Charts, Maps and tables below will provide you with a basic understanding of the effects of many types of natural disasters occurred in the region.

item.title: Orange earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.4M, Depth:10km) in Pakistan 13/05/2016 06:59 UTC, 1970926 people within 100km.
item.description: On 5/13/2016 6:59:32 AM, an earthquake occurred in Pakistan potentially affecting 1970926 people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.4M, Depth:10km.
